body_html:
So the reason for this is that the 1.3 branch was cut prior to that feature being updated.

Master: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/layers/python/layers/layers.py#L620

1.3: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.3/tensorflow/contrib/layers/python/layers/layers.py#L548

Closing as designed.

body:
So the reason for this is that the 1.3 branch was cut prior to that feature being updated.

Master: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/layers/python/layers/layers.py#L620

1.3: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.3/tensorflow/contrib/layers/python/layers/layers.py#L548

Closing as designed.
